response.original_title: How long does TotalAV refund take?
response.overview: {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} The time it takes to receive a TotalAV refund depends on several factors, including your payment method, bank processing time, and how the subscription was purchased. Many users want to know the expected timeline after canceling their subscription and submitting a refund request.  {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} In most cases, once a refund is approved by TotalAV, the amount is sent back to the original payment method used during purchase.  Typical TotalAV Refund Processing Time  {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} After your refund request is confirmed, TotalAV usually processes the refund within a few business days.  {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} Banks and card providers may then take additional time to post the refunded amount to your account.
